DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine , among adult total population , effect offer choice FluMist trivalent inactivate vaccine ( TIV ) employer set compare control group .
DOC.brief_title: Assessing Choice Employer Setting ( ACES ) Study
DOC.detailed_description: The primary objective determine , among adult 18-49 year old population total population , effect offer choice FluMist TIV without enhance advertisement/added incentive overall influenza vaccination rate employer set compare control group .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria employer site : Located United States Has previously offer FluMist employee vaccination program past FluMist represent less 5 % vaccine receive past program Data available allow reliable estimate employee ( total 1849 year old population ) vaccination rate 20072008 influenza season
